title: PRL Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 20 Technical Assistant, Technician B Posts
description: The Physical Research Laboratory (PRL) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 20 Technical Assistant and Technician B Posts. Interested and eligibile candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed theirÂ 10th pass, ITI, Diploma in Civil, Electrical, and Mechanical Engineering can apply for the PRL Recruitment 2025 .
